sentence.Network_en: She was very headstrong, and very together.

sentence.Network_en: The trouble with her is that she is too headstrong.
She's hopelessly headstrong; she always gets up against people around her.
sentence.Network_cn: 她任性得无要救药, 老是同周围的人闹别扭.

list.abs: if china cannot tame its headstrong banking system and quell inflationary expectations , its reputation for macroeconomic management will suffer .如果中国无法改革其顽固的银行体系，平抑通胀预期，其宏观管理的信誉就会受损。

encyclopedia.content: 2007年2月6日，ashley tisdale发表了首张专辑《Headstrong》，共售出64,000份，同时她还被音乐杂志《Blender》推为流行音乐R&B界“Hottest Woman”的第二名，得到的评价是“天使般的嗓音和耀眼的人格魅力，而且拥有那种非常稀少的听众缘：数百万的青少年都在翘首以待她的出道专辑。”

entry.tran: 固执的;任性的;刚愎自用的
entry.def: If you refer to someone as headstrong, you are slightly critical of the fact that they are determined to do what they want.

example.ex: He's young, very headstrong, but he's a good man underneath.
example.tran: 他年青、任性，但骨子里是个好人。

means.word_mean: 1. habitually disposed to disobedience and opposition

sentences.en: He’s been willful and headstrong from a baby.
The trouble with her is that she is too headstrong.
She’s hopelessly headstrong; she always gets up against people around her.
